body.name: Lee Women’s Tall Instantly Slims Classic Relaxed Fit Monroe Straight Leg
features: PERFECT COMFORT, PERFECT FIT: These premium stretch denim jeans hug your curves yet keep their shape wear after wear. The no-gap Waistband designed to properly fit curvy seats and narrow waists, with a hidden cellphone pocket to keep essentials secure

STYLISH DESIGNS: Lee's full line of women's shorts, women's jeans, women's skirts, women's jackets & more provide you with a stylish wardrobe all year round. From denim skirts for summer barbecues to jean jackets for windy fall days, Lee keeps you going.

MORE THAN DENIM: You already trust Lee to bring you your favorite jeans, but we're so much more than that! Lee makes quality, stylish jeans, khakis, dresses, skirts, jackets, belts, shorts, shirts, uniforms and more! Fill your closet with Lee quality.

QUALITY OVER QUANTITY: For over 100 years, Lee has been making quality, dependable denim. We'd rather sell one quality garment than 100 inferior ones. If you're looking for quality jeans, shorts, jackets, skirts, overalls, belts or uniforms, look to Lee.

Inseams: Short 30", Med 32", Long 34". Rise 9.375", Leg Open. 17.5". Measurements taken using size 10 med & may vary by size. Midrise boot-leg jean w/ contoured waistband & contrast stitching; Hidden phone storage in back pocket; Zipper & button closure
body.description: Just like our founder, H.D. Lee, our passion is helping can-do people do more. We are committed to designing clothing that conforms to your body, allowing you to move through life freely. We help you chase the things that bring you joy and laughter. The things that make you fearless and hopefully because your passion is what makes you unique. And what moves you, moves us. Move your Lee. Closure Type: Zip-Fly with button closure

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #33,841 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #291 in Women's Jeans

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My New Lee Jeans Look & Fit Great
reviews.reviewText: The "Lee Tall Instantly Slims Classic Relaxed Fit Monroe Straight Leg Jeans" are my absolute favorite jeans. They are the best fitting and best looking jeans I own. In fact, this is my 3rd purchase of them. I now own 5 of the 6 colors offered. This time, I bought them in the color Ellis. These jeans are made for tall / leggy women who need long length jeans. The 11.5" front rise of the jean allow them to sit comfortably about mid way between the waist and belly button. These top quality stretch denim, fashionable, straight leg, button fly jeans have a 34" inseam and a built in tummy panel that instantly and continuously slims to provide a flattering and shapely fit around my waist, hips and buttocks helping me to look my best.*** Inseam Problem SolvedThe folks at Lee helped us tall / long legged women by making jeans with the longer inseams we need in order for them to fit us correctly. This entire line of Tall sized jeans have a 34 inch inseam. For someone like me who is very leggy and is 5' 9", I know these jeans will look and fit me good. Additionally, since proper inseam length is no longer an issue for me, when I wear these jeans, I can also wear practically any of my shoe styles and heel heights with them: from my flats, sneakers and sandals to my fashionable high high heel pumps, platforms and open toe designs, in these jeans, I can wear them all. Thanks Lee!*** Fashionable DenimIn my opinion, the Relaxed Fit and Classic Straight Leg styling of the Monroe jean is the fresh, contemporary, fashionable denim look I want to wear, coordinate and accessorize for. The high quality fabrics used in the stretch denim help slim my figure and fit me better than the other brands / styles I've tried in the past. That's the reason I keep coming back to Lee and why I bought these jeans in five colors.*** Quality & ComfortThe blend of the cotton, polyester and spandex of 81%, 18% and1% respectively was done to create the high quality fabric needed in the jeans and helps the slimming, shaping and contouring of the waist, hips and buttocks. This blending ratio also gives the jeans their softness, the ideal amount of stretchiness that is needed to enhance the shapely silhouette look we like and, ensures the all day comfort and wear ability we expect. NOTE: The jean material's blend and the ratios just mentioned apply to all the colors offered EXCEPT the color Palisade as its material blend listed as 98% Cotton and 2% Spandex . Therefore, since I do not own and haven't worn that color in these jeans, I cannot be certain of how the Palisade colored / named jeans perform.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these jeans!
reviews.reviewText: Super comfortable, fit is just what my size is, my only thing is they are long (but I’m used to that because I’m short at 5’2”). Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good jeans; fit well
reviews.reviewText: I like the jeans. I’m 5’9 and a half and ordered long. I ordered a 12 and they fit great! The still are a little short to me but they are okay. They even say curvy with a stretch. They have a strong smell so I hope it washes out. The jeans have some cute silver embellishments but definitely not the same Lee Jeans from the 90s with thick “Jean” material.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable Jean.
reviews.reviewText: Fits like a glove and is a very flexible jean to wear. Highly recommend these Lee jeans.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best jeans I’ve ever had
reviews.reviewText: These are the most comfortable jeans, and the best fitting jeans ever! I’m 74 and have had many jeans in my life. As a full-figured woman, it’s important to have the jeans fit a woman’s tummy area, not come up to her hips and then stop! I don’t have to pull on these. They were too long so I did have to have them altered but was willing to do that since they fit like a glove elsewhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars these are looser through the leg than I would like.
reviews.reviewText: These are loose fitting jeans, especially though the thigh (not what I intended to order). To me, Classic Fit is what I have worn for years--not skinny, not baggy ("classic"). When I first tried these on I wondered if I should return them for a smaller size; but, although the waist was loose, they fit fairly snugly through the seat and so I kept them. However, after wearing them a couple of times (before they were washed) they stretched a bit through the hips, so now they are kind of baggy. I'm 72 and do try to dress for my age, but these are still looser through the leg than I would like.Update: I have now washed these jeans two times and the waist is no longer loose--it's quite comfortable in fact, but I would still only give them 3 stars; the stride is a little longer than I would like -- they just don't fit my body type. When I ordered I was paying more attention to the length of the inseam because I have such a hard time finding jeans long enough. I was thrilled to find jeans with a 34" inseam and I didn't really look at the picture, but the picture is fairly accurate--the legs are pretty straight all the way down from the hips.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very very comfortable!
reviews.reviewText: Love the fit, they wash extremely well. 👌

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the 10 Long and they fit well in the waist and seat but they were just too short. They actually appeared to just be regular (or maybe even short) length jeans with the hem ripped out and left unfinished! Even with the extra length from that, they barely came to my ankle. Really disappointing.

These jeans are sooo good. Color is exactly what i wanted, more on the dark side. Am 5ft 4 in; order the short and its perfect, can wear flats or even a little heel. The fit is perfect. Accommodates my hips nicely!Highly recommend. Lee jeans like in our youth!

reviews.reviewTitle: This is my new favorite pair of jeans.
reviews.reviewText: I'm very picky about jeans. I am 212lbs at 5'10 and have a very long inseam. My entire life it's been so hard to find pants that were both large enough and long enough for me to wear. But these. These are perfect, I love them so much, the fit perfectly, and they are the PERFECT length! They really really REALLY are slimming too! My mother said to me "have you lost weight?" when I wore them, even though I totally hadn't. I just can't get over how much I love these jeans. I wish they made them in all different colours, I would buy them all!
Nicest jeans I've had for years. Flattering and a perfect fit. Hard to find jeans that are long enough for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 11, 2021
reviews.reviewText: The jeans didn't fit well - too curvy for my body shape so I decided to return them. The cost of a postal return to the U.S. was £23 ... only refundable if garment was faulty, which it wasn't. I should have read the small print. I decided it wasn't worth the expense to return them. Very disappointing - a company the size of Lee should provide free returns in my opinion. I would have used UBS but the nearest drop off point to where I live is 23 miles away.
The best jeans ever for a curvy figure. Small waist and larger hips! Fit like a glove . Very flattering.
